attributes.action: Ban the use of strip search in schools
attributes.background: No child should be strip searched while at school. If there are valid reasons to suspect a child needs to be searched then the child, their parents/guardian/carer and a safeguarding officer should be taken to a station where a safeguarding assessment is done before any search is undertaken.
